Articles.Content: Just kind of wondering but, has anybody noticed that Kerbin is not actually on orbit? sometimes when you zoom out from your spacecraft, and it doesnt happen often, you can see the actual orbit it is supposed to be in beside Kerbin. Kerbin is actually farther from kerbol than it is supposed to be.
It\'s nothing more than a graphical glitch, don\'t pay it any mind. It\'s one of those small, not-too-common glitches that aren\'t too high on the to-do list
